name: Protection Perfected Kit
about: What it is:A set that provides beautiful broad spectrum SPF 50+ protection alone or under makeup to defend skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays..Skin Type:Normal and Dry.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Moroccan Thyme Extract: Defends against visible signs of photo-aging..What Else You Need to Know:The ultra-nourishing formula of UV Protective Cream SPF 50+ diminishes the appearance of fine lines caused by dryness while enhancing resilience and providing up to 10 hours of moisture with no visible white cast..This Set Contains:- 1.69 oz/ 50 mL UV Protective Cream SPF 50+
ingredients: -Moroccan Thyme Extract: Defends against visible signs of photo-aging..-Rich Vitality Botanical: Prevents and improves the look of fine lines caused by UV damage..-Angelica Acutiloba Extract: Protects and restores itself from environment aggressors...UV Protective Cream SPF 50+:.Avobenzone 2.3%,Sunscreen Homosalate 10.0%,Sunscreen Octisalate 5.0%,Sunscreen Octocrylene how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start off with your Clu00e9 de Peau Micellar Cleansing Water to remove any excess traces of makeup..-Next, apply Concentrated Brightening Serum all over your face, followed by your favorite Clu00e9 de Peau moisturizer (sold separately)..-Lastly, apply UV Protective Cream SPF 50+ for lightweight protection.
